name: TheFates
description:
End the war between the gods of night and day by destroying their symbols and defeating their armies, in this retro arcade style platformer with a fully destructible environment.

Press TAB in game to see Controls

Controls [W-A-S-D ] : [U-I]

The phenomenal music was created by these fantastic creators,

Rob0neMusic 

  • Chiptune Madness - Space Swing
  • Chiptune Madness - Ninja Spirit
  • Chiptune Madness - Tokyo Invasion
  • Chiptune Madness - Myths of Japan

Jobegiar99

  • Solitude
